maml:description.maml:para: Removes a DS-Client Detailed Schedule from a schedule

Removes a DS-Client Detailed Schedule from a schedule. IMPORTANT The DetailId is generated by this module. Use Get-DSClientScheduleDetail prior to running this Cmdlet to get the DetailId. Changes to the Schedules may change the DetailId associated with Schedule Details. Use with caution.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specify the Schedule Id
Specify the Detail Id
Specify the Detail Id
Specify the Schedule Id

dev:remarks.maml:para: Remove Schedule Detail with Id 2 from Schedule with Id 3

maml:description.maml:para: Removes SNMP Communities and/or hosts from communities. Removing the last host from a community will also remove the community.

Specify Hosts to add to SNMP Community

Removes the host monitoring.local from the Community named public
